content: I'll definitely keep an eye on how news organizations are using AI to enhance their reporting and news gathering processes. Speaking of reporting, I've been meaning to cancel my subscription to People Magazine, which I got as a gift from my sister last year. I don't really have time to read it anymore, and most of the news I care about I can get online for free. But I have to admit, sometimes I'll flip through it when I'm waiting in line or at the doctor's office. I remember reading an issue last month that had a really interesting interview with a celebrity I like.
